tool.name: Methylation Analyser
tool.command:
Rscript pipeline.R
##input $MethFinalReportFile ##1 $SamplePhenotypeFile ##2
##output $site_level ##3 $region_level ##4 $rdata ##5 $qc ##6
##sitetest - parameter $testmethod ##7
#if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=="advanced":
$adv_opts.na_omit ##8 $adv_opts.XYchrom ##9 $adv_opts.peakcorrection ##10 $adv_opts.normalization ##11 $adv_opts.transfm ##12 $adv_opts.locidiff ##13 $adv_opts.samplefilterdetectP ##14 $adv_opts.samplefilterperc ##15 $adv_opts.sitefilterdetectP ##16 $adv_opts.sitefilterperc ##17
#else:
TRUE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE FALSE "1e-5" "0.75" "0.05" "0.5"
## End of advanced options: #end if
2>&1

param.name: na_omit
param.label: Remove the sites containing missing beta value

param.name: XYchrom
param.label: Remove the sites on chromosome X

param.name: locidiff
param.label: If not checked, don't filter sites by the difference of group beta value. Otherwise, remove the sites with beta value difference smaller than the specified value

param.name: samplefilterdetectP
param.label: Sample level detection cutoff
param.help: The cutoff for sample-level detection Pvalue

param.name: samplefilterperc
param.label: Loci percentage
param.help: The percent of loci with detection Pvalue less than 'Sample level detection cutoff' in each sample

param.name: sitefilterdetectP
param.label: Site-level cutoff
param.help: The cutoff for site-level detection Pvalue

param.name: sitefilterperc
param.label: Sample percentage
param.help: The percent of samples with detection Pvalue less than 'Site-level cutoff' for each site

data.name: rdata
data.label: Rdata which stores the region-level analysis results

tool.help:
Illumina Methylation Analyser =============================
Wrapper for the IMA_ R-package.
